sentences.en: " Is the " black - and - white " toothpaste on sale today? "
sentences.cn: " 黑白 " 牌牙膏今天有卖 吗 ?

sentences.en: " Yes , I need a tube of toothpaste. "
sentences.cn: 是的, 我要一筒牙膏.

sentences.en: Carry personal items such as toothpaste with you.
sentences.cn: 带好个人物品,如牙膏等.

sentences.en: Don't leave the toothpaste with the top off.
sentences.cn: 牙膏用后别忘了盖上盖.

sentences.en: Give the tube of toothpaste a squeeze.
He squeezed on the tube until some toothpaste came out.
sentences.cn: 他挤牙膏管直到挤出一些牙膏.

sentences.en: He squeezed out the last bit of toothpaste from the tube.
sentences.cn: 他将管子里的最后一点牙膏挤了出来.

sentences.en: He squeezed the last bit toothpaste out.
He squeezed the tube hard and the last bit of toothpaste came out.
sentences.cn: 他使劲挤牙膏管子,挤出了最后一点牙膏.

sentences.en: Put the cap back on the toothpaste.
sentences.cn: 把盖子重新拧在牙膏管上.

sentences.en: Shaving supplies, toothpaste, and soap were found inside.
sentences.cn: 在里面找到了剃须用品、牙膏和肥皂。

sentences.en: to squeeze a tube of toothpaste
Toothpaste is stock merchandise in a drugstore.
sentences.cn: 牙膏是杂货店里的常备商品.

sentences.en: Which brand of toothpaste do you use?
Would you pass me my toothpaste?
sentences.cn: 把牙膏递给我好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Yes, and another thing, would you mind not using my toothpaste?
sentences.cn: 是的, 还有, 请不要用我的牙膏好 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: a thick substance that you use to clean your teeth
